quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! First of all, you could, like, move south. And then, move east. Okay, and then, venture south. Once you accomplish that, attempt to go west. And then, try to move south. And then, travel west. And then, venture south. With that accomplished, try to travel west. With that done, recover the key from the cabinet. With the key, look and see that the chest in the vault is unlocked. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a vault. An usual kind of place.

 You make out a chest.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_0]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a cabinet.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a counter. [if there is something on the s_0]On the counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You are in a scullery. An usual kind of place.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a bowl. [if there is something on the s_1]On the bowl you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a garage.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You make a grand eccentric entrance into a cookhouse.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You've entered a studio.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the steam room.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You've entered a normal room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be normal. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the attic. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You arrive in a sauna. A normal kind of place.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a study.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a shower like it isn't some huge deal. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You make out a case. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The case contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The case is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've entered a kitchen. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a refrigerator.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a plate. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the plate.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a bedchamber.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've entered a cellar.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the restroom.

 You can make out a board. The board is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the board you can make out [a list of things on the s_3]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so standard all of a sudden, it's because you've just shown up in the pantry. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You can make out [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can see a shelf. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! The shelf is usual.[if there is something on the s_4] On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Hm. Oh well[end if] You can see a rack. [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the rack. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing is empty.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a spare room.

 You make out [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] crate.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The crate is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a bedroom.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
I just think it's great that you've just entered a laundry place. You begin looking for stuff.

 You can make out a rectangular chest.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The rectangular chest contains [a list of things in the c_6]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The rectangular chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see a dresser. Now that's what I call TextWorld![if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're now in a cubicle. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You see a American safe.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The American safe contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The American safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You are in an office. A standard kind of place.



There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: chest
infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The refrigerator looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The locker looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

objective: Welcome to another life changing game of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, attempt to take a trip south. And then, make an effort to take a trip east. After that, travel south. With that done, venture west. That done, travel south. Following that, take a trip west. With that accomplished, attempt to go south. And then, go to the west. With that accomplished, pick up the key from the cabinet. If you can get your hands on the key, doublecheck that the chest is unlocked with the key. That's it!
